name: V1 - Ocean Tiles
description: Layered blue squares arranged in a grid with random variations.

name: V2 - Play
description: This is inspired by Ed Sheeran's Play while keeping the art idea of Vera Moln√°r.

name: V3 - Flower Blues
description: Random clickable flowers in shades of blue with inspiration from Hobbs.

name: V4 - TriNeoBloss
description: Trippy Neon Blossoms that grow, rotate, and shimmer with your every hover.

name: Midnight Whirl
description: A colorful wavy spiral, inspired by Matt Pearson. In the Wave Clock, Pearson uses Perlin noise and spirals to create dynamic generative visuals.

name: Opus Swirl
description: Accelerate with Opus Swirl. A combination between Pearson's waveclock and the Opus song accelerating together, using Tone.js.
